page.title: 04HERALD EXPRESS NEWSPAPER
page.content: On Tuesday the 14th. of May we went to the {Herald Express}office at Hele Cross with Mr.Murdin,our teacher.The Herald Express is the largest local daily newspaper in the Torbay area. When we got there we went into the reception and looked at some photographs and an old printing machine.Soon a man came,who told us he was the Assistant Editor.First we went to an office where everybody was typing and on phones.We went to the back of the room and asked questions.After a few minutes we went up to the main office where there were people on computers and phones.Then we went on to the printing machine.The man told us that it printed 28,000 papers a day.Then we followed a belt where the papers were sent to vans and delivered.
